tu.note: Message displayed when trying to save ambiguous sequences in the ambiguous sequences dialog box, when one or more sequence does not have a base character specified.

tuv.seg: You must specify a base character.
Your base character must be contained within its associated ambiguous sequence.
你指定的基本字符必须是相关源记音字符序列中的一个字符。

tu.note: Message displayed when trying to delete an automatically generated ambiguous sequence in the ambiguous sequence dialog box.

tuv.seg: This ambiguous sequence was automatically generated based on phonetic transcriptions found in one or more data sources. Automatically generated ambiguous sequences may not be deleted.
根据数据源里的记音，音系助手已经将此字符序列设定为一个音素，此音素不能被删除。

tu.note: Message displayed in ambiguous sequences dialog box when identical sequences exist.

tuv.seg: 此多字符的音素已被设定了。
A base character may not be specified until you have specified an ambiguous sequence.
请先指定源记音的字符序列。
You must specify a base character.
This ambiguous sequence was automatically generated based on phonetic transcriptions found in one or more data sources. Automatically generated ambiguous sequences must be treated as one unit.
根据数据源里的记音，音系助手已经将此字符序列设定为一个音素，此音素不能被分开。

To include characters not shown in the lists to the left, enter them below. Include a space between each character. Include a diacritic placeholder (Ctrl+0) for non base characters.
若你想显示的字符或符号不在左边的列表里，请在下面输入。请在字符之间输入空格。输入非基本字符（比如附加符号）时，必须先输入占位符 (Ctrl+0)。

tu.note: Label next to OK/Cancel/Help buttons on options dialog box.

tuv.seg: The options for this tab will be saved only for the current project.
此标签的选项只会保存在现有项目里。
&Save last manually specified sort options as the default.
把上次手动指定的排序选项保存为默认选项。
For example, clicking column headings in the Data Corpus view will change the default options set on this tab for that view.
例如，在语料库视图里单击列标题就会更改那个视图里的默认选项。

第一个指定的Toolbox排序字段标记\n无法映射。必须指定映射。

tu.note: Heading above the field mappings list in the standard format data source properties dialog box.

tuv.seg: You must specify a record marker to identify the beginning of each record.
必须指定记录标记标明记录的起点。
Each field may only be mapped once.
每一个字段只能映射一次
You may only map the phonetic field once.\nA phonetic mapping is specified using the field type.
你只能把语音字段映射一次。\n请使用字段类型指定语音的映射。
You must specify the first interlinear field marker.
必须指定第一个隔行对照字段标记。
You must specify a mapping for '{0}' because you have specified it as the first interlinear field marker.
必须指定'{0}'的映射方式因为你把它指定为第一个隔行对照的标记.
You must specify at least two interlinear fields.
必须指定至少两个隔行对照字段。

tu.note: Used in open/save file dialogs as the type for all files.
File types for executable files.
File type for Phonology Assistant projects. The parameter is the application name.
Parameter is the application name.
File type for rich text format output.
Message displayed when SA 3.0.1 is not installed and the user is attempting to edit an audio file.

tuv.seg: Speech Analyzer 3.0.1 is required to edit audio data sources, but it is not installed. Please install Speech Analyzer 3.0.1 and try again.
先要安装Speech Analyzer 3.0.1软件才可以编辑音频文件。
The audio file '{0}' is cannot be found.

tu.note: Displayed when specified editor cannot be found when the user chooses 'Edit Source Record' from the edit menu.

tuv.seg: This project doesn't contain a field definition for an audio file path.
此项目里没有设定音频文件路径的字段。

tu.note: Displayed when no editor has been specified and the user chooses 'Edit Source Record' from the edit menu.

tuv.seg: No editor has been specified in the project settings for the following data source: '{0}'. See the help file for more information.
此项目设置里没有指定数据源'{0}'的编辑器。查看帮助文件以了解详情。
The first Toolbox sort field for this record's data source has not been specified. To specify the first Toolbox sort field, go to the data source's properties from the project properties dialog.
尚未指定此记录数据源的第一Toolbox排序字段。请到项目属性对话框里数据源的属性指定第一Toolbox排序字段。
There is no source record editor associated with this record.
此记录没有连接到任何编辑器。

It appears the audio file '{0}' may have been created using an old version of Speech Analyzer. In order for {1} to read data associated with this audio file it must first be converted using Speech Analyzer 3.0.1.
音频文件'{0}'可能是以Speech Analyzer旧版本创建的。为了{1}读取此音频文件的数据，先要把它转换到Speech Analyzer 3.0.1格式。
处理数据源文件'{0}'时有错误。
A field mapping to the phonetic field could not be found for the data source '{0}'
数据源'{0}'里没有映射到语音字段的字段。
An error occurred while reading data source file '{0}'.
读取数据源文件'{0}'时有错误。
An error occurred when trying to establish a connection to the '{0}' database on the machine '{1}'.
在计算机'{1}'上设立一个到'{0}'数据库的连接时有错误。
An error occurred while trying to get a list of FieldWorks projects.
获取FieldWorks项目清单时有错误。
初始化SA文档阅读器时有错误。
An error occurred while trying to read the source file '{0}'.
There was an error retrieving the data from the {0} database. It's possible the file '{1}' is either missing or corrupt. Reading this data will be skipped.
获取{0}数据库里的数据时有错误。文件'{1}'可能不存在或已损坏。音系助手将忽略这些数据。
SQL Server cannot be started. It may not be installed. Make sure FieldWorks Language Explorer has been installed or restart Phonology Assistant to try again.
无法启动SQL服务器。请先确定FieldWorks Language Explorer已被安装或重新启动音系助手重试一次。

Phonology Assistant waited {0} seconds for SQL Server to fully start up.
Either that is not enough time for your computer or it may not be installed.
Make sure FieldWorks Language Explorer has been installed. Would you
like to try again?
音系助手已经等待了{0}秒钟，SQL服务器还没有启动。请确定FieldWorks Language Explorer已被安装。你是否要重试？
FieldWorks 7.0 (or later) is not installed. It must be installed in order for Phonology Assistant to read the data source '{0}'. This data source will be skipped.
无法读取数据源'{0}'因为FieldWorks7.0或以上版本没有被安装。音系助手将忽略此数据源。

tu.note: This is used to display the project name and server for an FW data source. The project name is the first parameter.

tuv.seg: The file '{0}' is not a valid wave file.

The file that contains information to access FieldWork databases older than version 7.x '{0}' is either missing or corrupt. Until this problem is corrected, FieldWorks data sources cannot be accessed or added as data sources.
含有访问FieldWorks6.0.6或以下版本信息的文件不存在或已损坏。先要决绝这个问题才可以访问或添加FieldWorks数据源。

tu.note: Message displayed when failing to load a PaXml file.

tuv.seg: The following error occurred while loading '{0}'
The file that contains FieldWorks queries '{0}' is either missing or corrupt. Until this problem is corrected, FieldWorks data sources cannot be accessed or added as data sources.
含有FieldWorks查询'{0}'的文件不存在或已损坏。先要决绝这个问题才可以访问或添加FieldWorks数据源。

The data source file '{0}' is missing some standard format markers that were assigned to Phonology Assistant fields. Those assignments have been removed. To verify the assignment of markers to fields, go to the project settings dialog box, select the data source and click 'Properties'.
有些分配到音系助手字段的标准格式标记在数据源文件'{0}'里不存在。这些分配已被删除。如要核实数据源标记和音系助手字段的分配，请到项目设置对话框，选择数据源，并单击属性。

There are no writing systems for the '{0}' project. Therefore, no data from it can be displayed. To fix this problem, modify the FieldWorks data source properties for this project by selecting 'Project Settings' from the File menu. Then select the project in the data sources list and click the 'Properties' button.
'{0}'项目没有设定文字系统。因此，无法显示此项目的数据。请修改此项目的FieldWorks数据源属性以解决这个问题。

You are attempting to save the transcriptions for {0} in a location for which you do not have write access. Please specify another location in which to make a copy of {1} along with its transcription file ({2}).
你想把{0}的记音保存到你没有写入权限的位置。请指定另一个位置。

tu.note: Displayed when there is and error retrieving writing systems from a FieldWorks database, version 6.0 or earlier.

tuv.seg: There was an error retrieving writing systems from the '{0}' project. It's possible the file '{1}' is either missing or corrupt.
从'{0}'项目获取文字系统时有错误。文件'{1}'可能不存在或已损坏。
Access to FieldWorks projects requires SQL Server but it is not installed on this computer.
访问FieldWorks项目先需要安装SQL服务器。

FieldWorks Project: {0}
Server: {1}

The version of this FieldWorks project indicates it is too
recent to be read by Phonology Assistant. You must
download the file '{2}' from
the Phonology Assistant website and copy it to the
following folder:

{3}

When '{4}' is present in that folder,
your FieldWorks project can be read by Phonology Assistant.

The Phonology Assistant website can be found at:
http://www.sil.org/computing/pa/index.htm
The wave file '{0}' cannot be found.

tu.note: Message displayed when exporting lists and charts.

tuv.seg: Would you like to save your changes?
The help file '{0}' cannot be found.
Would you like to load the '{0}' project?

tu.note: Message displayed when SA 3.0.1 is not installed and the user is attempting to playback audio at a speed other than 100 percent.

tuv.seg: Speech Analyzer 3.0.1 is required to playback utterances at speeds other than 100%, but it is not installed. Please install Speech Analyzer 3.0.1 and try again.
先要安装Speech Analyzer 3.0.1软件才可以以不同的速度播放录音。
There was an error copying the file '{0}' to '{1}'. Make sure the file is not in use by another program.
把文件'{0}'复制到'{1}'时有错误。请确定此文件没有在其他程序中打开。
The AND group '{0}' contains a comma. Commas are only valid in OR groups.
'与'组'{0}'含有逗号。逗号只能出现在'或'组里。
The AND group '{0}' contains more than one literal phone, which is invalid and does not make sense in an AND group. Only single phones are allowed in AND groups.
'与'组'{0}'含有两个音素以上。'与'组只能包含单音素。

tu.note: Message displayed when a search pattern contains a class that doesn't exist in the project.

tuv.seg: The class '{0}' is not in this project. It may have been deleted.
此项目里没有组类'{0}'。它可能已被删除掉。
The diacritic placeholder pattern '{0}' is not inside an AND group. Diacritic placeholder patterns must be placed inside AND groups.
占位符'{0}'不在'与'组里。占位符必须放在'与'组里。
The pattern '{0}' contains at least one set of empty angle brackets.
搜索模式'{0}'含有一对空的尖括号。
The pattern '{0}' contains at least one set of empty braces.
搜索模式'{0}'含有一对空的大括号。
The pattern '{0}' contains at least one set of empty square brackets.
搜索模式'{0}'含有一对空的方括号。
Unhandled Exception encountered. Click here for details.
遇到了无法处理的例外。单击这里查看详情。
The following environment portion of the search pattern contains an illegal combination of characters. The symbols '#', '+' or '*' are not allowed together in the following environment.
搜索模式里的之后语境含有不合规则的符号组合。'#', '+'或'*'符号不能同时出现在之后语境里。
The preceding environment portion of the search pattern contains an illegal combination of characters. The symbols '#', '+' or '*' are not allowed together in the preceding environment.
搜索模式里的之前语境含有不合规则的符号组合。'#', '+'或'*'符号不能同时出现在之前语境里。
The search item portion of the search pattern contains an illegal symbol. The symbols '#', '+' and '*' are not valid in the search item.
搜索模式里的搜索对象含有不合规则的符号。'#', '+'和'*"符号不能出现在搜索对象里。
Diacritic placeholders are not valid in OR groups.
占位符不能出现在'或'组里。
The symbols '*' and '+' may not appear between square brackets together with a diacritic placeholder. One or the other is allowed, but not both.
'*'和'+'符号不能同时在方括号里跟占位符出现。只有其中一个可以跟占位符同时出现。
The text '{0}' is not recognized as valid phonetic data.
The symbol '{0}' is a base character and was found between square brackets together with a diacritic placeholder. Base characters are not allowed with diacritic placeholders.
基本字符'{0}'在方括号里跟占位符同时出现。基本字符不能和占位符同时出现。
The symbols '[]{}()<>+*_#' are not allowed in OR groups.
The text '{0}' in angled brackets is not a valid class name.
尖括号里的'{0}'不是合规则的组类名称。

The text '{0}' in square brackets is invalid. Other than surrounding 'AND' groups, square brackets are only used to surround descriptive or distinctive features, the designators for consonant or vowel classes ('[C]' and '[V]'), or a diacritic placeholder with its diacritics and wildcards.
方括号里的'{0}'不合规则。方括号只能用在'与'组、发音特征、区别特征、辅音类或元音类的符号('[C]'或'[V]')、或者占位符与其附加符号及通配符。
In the pattern '{0}', the number of open angle brackets does not match the number of closed.
在搜索模式'{0}'里，开尖括号的数量不符合闭尖括号的数量。
In the pattern '{0}', the number of open braces does not match the number of closed.
在搜索模式'{0}'里，开大括号的数量不符合闭大括号的数量。
In the pattern '{0}', the number of open square brackets does not match the number of closed.
在搜索模式'{0}'里，开方括号的数量不符合闭方括号的数量。
In the pattern '{0}', the number of open parentheses does not match the number of closed.
在搜索模式'{0}'里，开圆括号的数量不符合闭圆括号的数量。
The following environment portion of the search pattern contains a misplaced 'one or more' symbol (+). It must be at the end.
搜索模式里之后语境的'+'符号必须放在最后。
The preceding environment portion of the search pattern contains a misplaced 'one or more' symbol (+). It must be at the beginning.
搜索模式里之前语境的'+'符号必须放在最前面。
The following environment portion of the search pattern contains a misplaced word boundary symbol (#). It must be at the end.
搜索模式里之后语境的词界限符号('#')必须放在最后。
The preceding environment portion of the search pattern contains a misplaced word boundary symbol (#). It must be at the beginning.
搜索模式里之后语境的词界限符号('#')必须放在最前面。
The following environment portion of the search pattern contains a misplaced 'zero or more' symbol (*). It must be at the end.
搜索模式里之后语境的'*'符号必须放在最后。
The preceding environment portion of the search pattern contains a misplaced 'zero or more' symbol (*). It must be at the beginning.
搜索模式里之前语境的'*'符号必须放在最前面。
The OR group '{0}' only contains one item. OR groups should contain multiple items separated by commas.
'或'组'{0}'只含有一个搜索对象。'或'组至少要有一个以上搜索对象，以逗号分隔。

A match on the pattern '{0}' will include more than one phone. This text was found in an OR group and as such, it is invalid. OR groups should contain multiple items separated by commas and each item may represent a match on only one phone unless the item is surrounded by parentheses. Either one or more commas are missing or the item should be placed between parentheses.
'或'组应该含有一个以上的搜索对象，以逗号分隔。每一个对象只能代表一个音素，除非该对象在园括号里。请在'或'组内的搜索对象中加逗号或圆括号。
Parsing the pattern '{0}' resulted in nothing to search for.
分析了'{0}'搜索模式之后就没有搜索目标。
The following phone(s) are not found in the data:
在数据里找不到以下音素:
Syntax error. Pattern is not in the correct format: {0}
语法错误。搜索模式的格式不合规则: {0}
You must specify a search item.
The search pattern '{0}' contains the following error(s):
搜索模式'{0}'含有以下错误:
The search pattern contains the following error(s):
搜索模式含有以下错误:

tu.note: Message displayed in status bar next to the progress bar when doing a query searches.

tuv.seg: This program was not able to get your email program, if you have one, to send the error message. The contents of the error message has been placed on your Clipboard.
无法让你的电子邮件软件发送错误消息，所以把此错误消息的内容放在你的剪贴板上。
<Details of search errror have been copied to the clipboard. Please paste them here>
<已经把搜索错误详情复制到剪贴板上，请把错误详情粘贴在这里>
The pattern '{0}' contains too many diacritic placeholders in one of the AND groups. Only one diacritic placeholder is allowed per AND group.
搜索模式'{0}'里的一个'与'组含有太多占位符。一个'与'组只能包含一个占位符。
The One-Or-More-Diacritics symbol (+) appears too many times with a diacritic placeholder. Only one is allowed.
只能有一个'+'符号跟一个占位符同时出现。
The following environment portion of the search pattern contains too many 'one or more' symbols (+). Only one is allowed and it must be at the end.
搜索模式里的之后语境只能有一个'+'符号而且必须放在最后。
The preceding environment portion of the search pattern contains too many 'one or more' symbols (+). Only one is allowed and it must be at the beginning.
搜索模式里的之前语境只能有一个'+'符号而且必须放在最前面。
The following environment portion of the search pattern contains too many word boundary symbols (#). Only one is allowed and it must be at the end.
搜索模式里的之后语境只能有一个词界限符号('#')而且必须放在最后。
The preceding environment portion of the search pattern contains too many word boundary symbols (#). Only one is allowed and it must be at the beginning.
搜索模式里的之前语境只能有一个词界限符号('#')而且必须放在最前面。
The Zero-Or-More-Diacritics symbol (*) appears too many times with a diacritic placeholder. Only one is allowed.
只能有一个'*'符号跟一个占位符同时出现。
The following environment portion of the search pattern contains too many zero or more' symbols (*). Only one is allowed and it must be at the end.
搜索模式里的之后语境只能有一个'*'符号而且必须放在最后。
The preceding environment portion of the search pattern contains too many 'zero or more' symbols (*). Only one is allowed and it must be at the beginning.
搜索模式里的之后语境只能有一个'*'符号而且必须放在最前面。
Validating the pattern '{0}' caused the following exception:
确认搜索模式'{0}'引起了以下例外:
The following undefined phonetic symbol(s) were found:
找到了以下的未设定语音符号:
读取'{0}'文件时发生以下错误\n{1}
You must specify a mapping for the phonetic field.
必须指定语音字段的映射。
There was an error reading field information from the file '{0}'.
读取'{0}'文件里的信息有错误。
The project file '{0}' has an invalid format.
项目文件'{0}'的格式不合规则。
The file containing the '{0}' distinctive feature set is missing. The default set will be used instead.
含有'{0}'区别特征集的文件不存在，所以音系助手就会用默认特征集。
There was an error loading the project file '{0}'
加载项目文件'{0}'时有错误。

tu.note: Progress message after data source is read and the data is being parsed.
Message displayed whenever the phone inventory is built or updated.
Message displayed when an attempt is made to open a non existant project file. The parameter is the project file name.

tuv.seg: An error occurred attempting to backup your project before updating it for the latest version of Phonology Assistant.\n\nUntil the problem is resolved, this project cannot be opened using this version of Phonology Assistant.
把这个项目升级到最新的音系助手版本格式之前，先要备份。备份时有错误。先要解决这个问题才可以用此音系助手版本打开这个项目。

There was an error upgrading the '{0}' project to work with this version of Phonology Assistant. Until the problem is resolved, this project cannot be opened using this version of Phonology Assistant.
把'{0}'项目升级到此音系助手版本时有错误。先要解决这个问题才可以用此音系助手版本打开这个项目。
The '{0}' project has succssfully been upgraded to work with this version of Phonology Assistant. A backup of your old project has been made in:\n\n{1}
项目文件'{0}'已经被升级到此音系助手版本。原来项目的备份保存在此位置:\n\n{1}

Important Note: Some features in Phonology Assistant have changed and this has implications for the feature overrides, search queries and classes for the '{0}' project. These have been updated accordingly. However, you may want to verify the accuracy of the results, especially if you have overridden some features for this project. To check the feature overrides, from the Tools menu, go to 'Descriptive Features' (formerly called articulatory features) and 'Distinctive Features' (formerly called binary features) and verify the accuracy of overridden features. Overridden phones and features will be highlighted in yellow.
请注意：音系助手的一些功能改变了。音系助手旧版本的某些发音特征与区别特征名称改变了。如要确定升级项目文件的结果，请到'工具'菜单里的'发音特征'与'区别特征'察看升级文件中新的特征名称。
复制到剪贴板\n(将占位符清除掉)

tu.note: Status bar message displayed when building consonant chart.

tuv.seg: Add a search environment\nin this cell
在此格里添加搜索语境
Add a search item in this cell
在此格里添加搜索对象
Are you sure you want to remove the saved chart?
确定要删除已保存的分布表吗？
You must first choose 'Fill Chart' before seeing search results.
若想看搜索结果，请先单击'填写分布表'。
This search pattern contains the following phone(s) not found in the data.
此搜索模式含有不出现在数据里的以下音素。
This search pattern contains the following error(s):
此搜索模式有以下错误:
This search pattern contains the following undefined phonetic symbol(s).
此搜索模式含有以下未设定的语音符号。

tu.note: Button to delete saved charts on the distribution charts view. The button is on the right side of the heading over the saved charts list.

tuv.seg: There is already a saved chart with the name '{0}'.
名称为'{0}'的分布表已经存在。

tu.note: Caption at the top of the side bar in the distribution Charts view.

tuv.seg: Enter search pattern in the form\nSearch Item/Preceding Environment__Following Environment
根据以下的形式输入搜索模式\n搜索对象/之前的语境__之后的语境
Before saving a search pattern, you must first add a category to the saved pattern list.
保存搜索模式前，先要添加新的文件夹。
Are you sure you want to remove the search category '{0}'?
确定要删除搜索模式文件夹'{0}'吗？
Are you sure you want to remove the search pattern '{0}'?
确定要删除搜索模式'{0}'吗？
There is already a category named '{0}'.
There is already a saved search pattern named '{0}' in the same category.
在同文件夹里，搜索模式'{0}'已经存在。
There is already a saved search pattern named '{0}' in the same category. Would you like it overwritten?
在同文件夹里，搜索模式'{0}'已经存在。你是否要复写？

tu.note: This is the default name given to new categories in the saved search pattern tree in search view.
Message shown in the saved search pattern list when there are on saved patterns.

tuv.seg: 没有已保存的搜索模式

tu.note: Status bar message displayed when building building vowel chart.
Heading text on transcription changes popup in word lists.
Text for command link on the experimental transcription items cell popup
Text for command link on the uncertainty possibilities cell popup
Displayed in a word list cell when there was an error retrieving data for the cell. This should never be used, but just in case...
The item in the group by fields menu (and toolbar menu) indicating no field is being grouped on.
Shows in place of a word list grid when the user has turned on minimal pairs and there aren't any to show.

tuv.seg: No minimal pairs to display.\nChange the minimal pairs options and try again.
找不到最小异音字对。\n更改最小异音字对的选项并重试一次。

tu.note: The value for the 'Word List' label when the exported list is not filtered or the result of a search query.
The heading output for Date/Time name when exporting word lists to rtf. 1st param is a rtf tab; 2nd param is the Date/Time name.
The heading output for the grouped on field when exporting find phone results to rtf. 1st param is a rtf tab; 2nd param is the search pattern.
The heading output for Language name when exporting word lists to rtf. 1st param is a rtf tab; 2nd param is the language name.
The heading output for Number of Records when exporting word lists & find phone results to rtf. 1st param is a rtf tab; 2nd param is the number or records.
The heading output for Project name when exporting word lists to rtf. 1st param is a rtf tab; 2nd param is the project name.
The heading output for the Search Query when exporting find phone results to rtf. 1st param is a rtf tab; 2nd param is the search pattern.

tuv.seg: 搜索模式:{0}{1} (最小音异字对)

tu.note: The heading output for the Search Query when exporting find phone results to rtf. 1st param is a rtf tab; 2nd param is the search pattern.
The heading output for Word List name when exporting word lists to rtf. 1st param is a rtf tab; 2nd param is the Word List name.
First argument is rtf file; second argument is error message.
First argument is rtf file; second argument is the editor; third argument is error message.
Save file dialog caption for specifying the rtf file exported to under RTF export
What's displayed in the record view when there is no data.

tuv.seg: Define a search pattern above and click Show Results.
在上面设定搜索模式然后单击"显示结果"。
搜索对象两边的语境一样(&O)
搜索对象之后的语境一样(&F)
搜索对象之前的语境一样(&P)

tu.note: Displayed in the search results area when no matches were found.

tuv.seg: Search Transcriptions Derived from Primary and &Non Primary Uncertainties
搜索来自主要及次要未确定音素的记音
Search Transcriptions Derived Only from &Primary Uncertainties
搜索来自主要未确定音素的记音
显示每一个词条的所有搜索结果(&A)
含有未确定音素的记录
发音方法(辅音)或舌位高度(元音)(&M)
发音部位(辅音)或舌位前后(元音)(&P)
Add Tab in New Si&de-by-Side Tab Group
Add Tab in New St&acked Tab Group

tu.note: The text for this is ignored. The button only displays an image.
